channel.title: A couple of questions - Devo
channel.description:
1. How can I change the amount of gold dropped by monsters? 2. Why do Black Knight Titan, San whatever, and Nechryael take me back to Yanille? 3. How can I change the magic EXP rate? 4. How do I change the max level in devo? 5. What is up with this error? [IMG]http://i292.photobucket.com/albums/mm31/cozmo131/7err.jpg[/img] It obviously shows I have the semi-colons inserted...
Please help, I'm new to devo and It kinda gets overwhelming... :S

item.title: A couple of questions - Devo
item.dc:creator: @Jerrod Jerrod
item.description:
@Jerrod wrote:

I’m still pretty confused.

  1. No
  2. No
  3. Don’t know… I guess the server came like that.

The rest confuses me :S.

Read full topic

item.title: A couple of questions - Devo
item.dc:creator: @Power_For_It Power For It
item.description:
@Power_For_It wrote:

go into config folder and go to npcdrops.cfg it actually rly easy i also have devo source with ::master command ::notedbarrows ::god etc and im adding more

Also i got a question

  1. Did you make backups
  2. Did you search hitdiff in client.java?
  3. Did you make it so everyones premium?
    And im assuming since you didnt know how to add NPC drops and stuff like that you decided to go into NPCHANDLER.java and NPCLIST.java and NPC.java instead of using the cfg files… those might be the 7 errors.

Read full topic
